title: Niveus
description: An alternate cover edition can be found here.Niveus is perfectly peculiarWintergrave seems the perfect place to shield Niveus from untold dangers until…Malik, smitten with such profound hatred of Ravan, comes with one intent—to destroy the mercenary’s daughter.Malik’s scheme takes a twisted turn, however when he first sees Niveus, and his wicked plan drags her on an epic trek like no other. But with her power at Malik’s disposal, it seems no one can stop him.Is undying love the only thing that will conquer true evil? But what sacrifice is required to finally destroy Malik’s bloody reign? Venture to 14th century Prussia to discover if Malik will be undone or if Niveus, or someone she loves…is lost forever.
author: Sharon Cramer
